This case-sensitive code system http://terminology.hl7.org/CodeSystem/diagnosis-role defines the following codes:

CodeDisplayDefinition
AD Admission diagnosisThe diagnoses documented for administrative purposes as the basis for a hospital or other institutional admission
DD Discharge diagnosisThe diagnoses documented for administrative purposes at the time of hospital or other institutional discharge
CC Chief complaint
CM Comorbidity diagnosis
pre-op pre-op diagnosis
post-op post-op diagnosis
billing BillingThe diagnosis documented for billing purposes

name: DiagnosisRole
title: Diagnosis Role
description: This value set defines a set of codes that can be used to express the role of a diagnosis on the Encounter or EpisodeOfCare record.
